record.title: PERMISSION FOR MEMBER TO BE CONSIDERED AS FIRST SPONSOR OF H.R. 866
record.narrative:
PERMISSION FOR MEMBER TO BE CONSIDERED AS FIRST SPONSOR OF H.R. 866 -- (House of Representatives - October 30, 2007)

[Page: H12195]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that I may hereafter be considered to be the first sponsor of H.R. 866, a bill originally introduced by Representative Norwood of Georgia, for the purposes of adding cosponsors and requesting reprintings pursuant to clause 7 of rule XII.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
